text: minisun siyallanma (arambhayedi ekama dharmayak anugamanaya karana) ekama samuhayak vasayen sitiyaha. pasuva (taman tula æti vu irsyave hetuven vividha samuhayan vasayen) khedi giyaha. (aparadhayata vu phalavipaka paralovadi purana vasayen denu labanneya yayi nabiye!) oba deviyange poronduva dænatamat æti novune nam, ovun karamin siti aparadhayanhi hetuven ovunge karanava (me vana vitat) avasan vi ætteya
